title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting projects P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not displayed.
EB: Both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available when multiple projects are selected in the Navigator.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Create two projects 'P1' and 'P2'. 2. Select project 'P2' and attempt to close it.
